Nicaragua.title: Nicaragua
Nicaragua.byline: Nicaragua is the largest country in Central America by area and the least densely populated.

Nice.title: Nice
Nice.byline: Nice (pronounced like the English word "niece") is a large city in France on the French Riviera.

Nicolosi.title: Nicolosi
Nicolosi.byline: Nicolosi is a town in Sicily near Mount Etna.

Nicosia.title: Nicosia
Nicosia.byline: Nicosia (Greek: Λευκωσία; Turkish: Lefkoşa) is the capital of Cyprus and is the largest city by far.

Nicosia (North).title: Nicosia (North)
Nicosia (North).byline: North Nicosia (Turkish: Lefkoşa) is the Turkish Cypriot side of the divided city of Nicosia, and the capital of Northern Cyprus.

Nicoya Peninsula.title: Nicoya Peninsula
Nicoya Peninsula.byline: Nicoya Peninsula (Spanish: Península de Nicoya) is a region in Costa Rica.

Nichinan.title: Nichinan
Nichinan.byline: Nichinan (日南市) is a small city in southern Miyazaki prefecture.

Nicholasville.title: Nicholasville
Nicholasville.byline: Nicholasville is a city of 31,000 (2019) in Jessamine County in the Bluegrass Region.
